thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 39 of 522
thread.title: Susan

author: Susan
title: Susan
text:
As an IT person, I understand that design of websites is pertinent to a customers shopping experience.
This site has bad links everywhere, automatic filters don't remove items that are out of stock or out in a specific size, instructions regarding updating billing info don't work and if you're lucky enough to be able to check out with one hour when trying to purchase a few sports bras - the items will be out of stock by the time you complete your transaction. This is not the first, third, or even fifth time this has happened.
